column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This place lives up to the hype!  I come here as often as I can
column3: but those buttery morsels of kouigne ammane says Yes Yes yes!  There is always some sort of line
column4: but they are extremely efficient with the ordering process.  You can order everything from baked goods (must try the kouigne amanne if I did not make that clear already!
